title: POLISHING SLURRY COMPOSITION ENABLING IMPLEMENTATION OF MULTI-SELECTIVITY

samples.experiment_context: Polishing of TEOS film using slurry defined in Example 1. Additive liquid composition: Aquazol 5 (Polymer with amide bond) 0.2 wt%, Polyquaterniam (Cationic polymer) 0.00 wt%, Serine (Amino acid) 0.2 wt%. Polishing liquid pH: 4. Additive liquid pH: 4.5-5.5. Polishing liquid to additive liquid flow rate ratio: 4:1.

abrasive_ceria_concentration.comment: Concentration in the initial polishing liquid (pH 4) which contains colloidal ceria with primary particle size 60 nm.

additives.name: Aquazol 5 (poly(2-ethyl-2-oxazoline))
additives.details: General structure for amide bond polymers given by Chemical Formula 1 in source document (images/img-0.jpeg, images/img-1.jpeg, images/img-2.jpeg).

solvent.name: DI water
solvent.comment: Assumed solvent for additive liquid and polishing liquid.

particle_size_distribution.comment: Primary particle size of ceria abrasives in polishing liquid.

samples.experiment_context: Polishing of TEOS film using slurry defined in Example 9. Additive liquid composition: Aquazol 5 (Polymer with amide bond) 0.2 wt%, Polyquaterniam (Cationic polymer) 0.05 wt%, Serine (Amino acid) 0.2 wt%. Polishing liquid pH: 4. Additive liquid pH: 4.5-5.5. Polishing liquid to additive liquid flow rate ratio: 1.5:1. Note: Example 9 is not explicitly in the provided table text, but inferred as a logical continuation or a typo in the description referring to Example 9. Using Example 4 data for flow rate 4:1 and cationic polymer 0.05% as a proxy if Example 9 data is missing. Assuming Example 9 refers to the condition that results in selectivity 0.3, which is Example 4.

abrasive_ceria_concentration.comment: Concentration in the initial polishing liquid (pH 4) which contains colloidal ceria with primary particle size 60 nm. Data used from Example 4 as proxy for Example 9.

processing_details.polishing_liquid_to_additive_liquid_flow: Slurry: 80-120 ml/min, Additive: 40-125 ml/min (Range from table)

particle_size_distribution.comment: Primary particle size of ceria abrasives in polishing liquid.

samples.experiment_context: Polishing of Polysilicon film using slurry defined in Comparative Example 1. Additive liquid composition: Aquazol 5 (Polymer with amide bond) 0.16 wt%, Histidine (Amino acid) 0.16 wt%, PEHA (Amine compound) 0.005 wt%. Polishing liquid pH: 4. Additive liquid pH: 4.5-5.5. Polishing liquid (slurry) to additive liquid flow rate ratio: 120-80 (slurry) : 40-125 (additive). Using average or representative values.

abrasive_ceria_concentration.comment: Concentration in the initial polishing liquid (pH 4) which contains colloidal ceria with primary particle size 60 nm.

additives.name: Aquazol 5 (poly(2-ethyl-2-oxazoline))
additives.details: General structure for amide bond polymers given by Chemical Formula 1 in source document (images/img-0.jpeg, images/img-1.jpeg, images/img-2.jpeg).
